properties.entry: SELECT CLASS_PHOTO, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_STATUS, TO_CHAR(CLASS_CREATE_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD') FROM CLASS WHERE CLASS_STATUS = ? AND MEMBER_NO = 100
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS WHERE CLASS_STATUS = ? AND MEMBER_NO = 100
SELECT TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD'), MEMBER_NM, BOARD_TITLE, PAYMENT_STATUS FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN PAID USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = 104

SELECT SETTLE_STATUS, MEMBER_NM, BOARD_TITLE, CLASS_PRICE, COMMISSION, SETTLE_DATE FROM SETTLE JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN CLASS USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE SETTLE_STATUS = ? AND MEMBER_NO = 100
